comments: Laelia philbrickiana Reichb. f. is named after this author.
examples: Laelia lilacina F.A.Philbrick ex Veitch, Man. Orchid. pl., 2: 89 (1887).
source: IK db. Desmond, Dict. Brit. & Irish Bot. & Hort. (1977). Who Was Who Cumulate Index 1897-1990 (1991). Obit. in Orchid Rev., 19: 30 (1911).
